SELECT A.DELIVERY_NUMBER , B.PAYMENT_PRICE , C.ORDER_DATE , C.ORDER_COUNT , D.GOODS_NAME , E.SHIPMENT_STATUS FROM TBL_DELIVERY A JOIN TBL_PAYMENT B ON (A.PAYMENT_NUM = B.PAYMENT_NUM) JOIN TBL_GOODS_ORDER C ON (B.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM) JOIN TBL_GOODS D ON(A.GOODS_NUMBER = D.GOODS_NUMBER) JOIN TBL_DELIVERY_STATUS E ON (A.SHIPMENT_CODE = E.SHIPMENT_CODE) WHERE A.USER_NO = #{userNo}
